function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The rise of new variants of the virus that may challenge vaccine efficacy","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of vaccines and increased spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring of variants and development of updated vaccines","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing technology for variant monitoring","People":"Researchers, healthcare workers, and the general population","Owner":"Health organizations and research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of compatible logical model for representing and sharing machine-readable patient monitoring and epidemiology surveillance data","Impact":"Inability to rapidly analyze and respond to epidemiological trends and patient data","Mitigation":"Development of a standardized logical model for data representation and sharing","Technologies":"Ontological modeling and data standardization tools","People":"Researchers and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Health organizations and standardization bodies"},{"Description":"Unclear taxonomy structure for infectious diseases ontology","Impact":"Difficulty in categorizing and understanding infectious disease concepts","Mitigation":"Extension and refinement of the taxonomic structure for infectious diseases","Technologies":"Ontological modeling and taxonomy management tools","People":"Research professionals and healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health and research institutions"}]}
